text: “Gua datɨrɨghɨn mangɨ Israelia bar men ziaba inigh. Gua gumaziba vaghvagh men ziabagh fogh da osirigh da mengegh. Eghtɨ Israelian gumazibar ziaba vaghvagh uan ananaba ko ikɨzibar ziabar apengan ikiam. Kar gumazir 20plan azeniba itiba, ko 20plan azenibagh afiraziba, me mɨdorozim damuamin gavgaviba iti.”
